```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(infer)
data(gss)

ggplot(gss, aes(x = partyid, 
                fill = college)) +
    geom_bar(position = "dodge")

ggplot(gss, aes(x = partyid, 
                fill = college)) +
    geom_bar(position = "fill") +
    labs(y = "proportion")
```

( ) 2
( ) 3
( ) 4
(X) 5
( ) 6
( ) 7


## Question 1.2

What type of variable is the number of students?

( ) Integer
( ) Continuous Numerical
(X) Discrete Numerical
( ) Logical
( ) Ordinal Categorical
( ) Nominal Categorical


## Question 1.3

( ) Spreadsheet
( ) Table
( ) Contingency Table
(X) Data Frame
( ) Data Table
